quicken.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to become quicker or make something quicker
quicken.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Ray glanced at his watch and quickened his pace  (=began to walk faster).
Companies are finding it hard to cope with the quickening pace of technological change.
She caught sight of Rob and felt her heart quicken.
quicken.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a feeling quickens, or if something quickens it, it becomes stronger or more active
quicken.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: This policy served only to quicken anti-government feeling.
